mapper.select: SELECT NM, PRNT_PHONE FROM TB_STDT JOIN TB_USR ON TB_STDT.ID = TB_USR.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ATTND ON TB_STDT.STDT_NO = TB_ATTND.STDT_NO WHERE TB_ATTND.ATTND_TP IS NULL
SELECT PHONE FROM TB_USR JOIN TB_STDT ON TB_USR.ID = TB_STDT.ID
